tool_description: Unlock the power of cryptocurrency with withAPI Finance Hub. Access up-to-the-minute crypto market data, including prices, trading volumes, and blockchain insights. Empower your projects with invaluable crypto knowledge and stay at the forefront of innovation. Join us in the world of crypto finance.
name: withAPI Finance Hub
title: withAPI Finance Hub

api_list.name: GetAvailableChains
api_list.description: This operation allows you to retrieve a comprehensive list of all available cryptocurrency chains, along with detailed descriptions for each chain. Explore the diverse world of cryptocurrencies and gain valuable insights into their unique features and use cases. This information is invaluable for developers, traders, and enthusiasts seeking to understand and engage with various blockchain networks.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://withapi-finance-hub1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/available-chains/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "withapi-finance-hub1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://withapi-finance-hub1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/available-chains/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "withapi-finance-hub1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GetContractPrice
api_list.description: This operation allows users to obtain the current market price of a token by providing its unique contract address.

required_parameters.name: contract
required_parameters.description: The unique contract address of the token you want to query.

required_parameters.name: chain
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the blockchain or chain you wish to target.
